title: Particle Effects Glitches
body: Have had this occur twice now and it's not as though it's a huge issue but it is a bug so thought I should report it.

replies.body: Said the same thing in another comment "Riot probably won't read it here because it is in the 'miscellaneous' folder not the 'Help & Support' folder.
Yeah I've been having this issue for ages. I notice it mostly with Sivir's W, where the ricochet just gets stuck and continues spinning in the same spot.
